name: AudibleStories
0:
”Alexa, open Audible Stories”
”Alexa, ask Audible Stories for a funny story”
”Alexa, ask Audible Stories for a night time story”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: audible stories
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can listen free on any Alexa device. Audible membership is not required.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Just say "Alexa, read me a story," or "Alexa, open Audible Stories" to view or hear the list of genres
2. Select or ask for the genre you’re in the mood for
3. Your story will begin to play

Once a story is finished, you will be given an option to listen to another story in the same genre, or you can ask for a different one.

By default, the Alexa Skill will remember where you left off. Just say "Alexa, read me a story" or "Alexa, open Audible Stories" again the next time you use it.

AVAILABLE GENRES: 
* Night-Time
* Funny
* Scary
* Family
* Sci-Fi
* Fantasy
* Adventure
* Romance
* Feel-Good
* Meditation 
* Relaxation for Sleep
* Random

You can ask Alexa to play a short story from a specific genre. For example, try saying “Alexa, read me a night-time story.”


Audible also offers thousands of Audible Originals, podcasts, and bestselling audiobooks.
